system.description:
Choose a Psionic Skill

Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.h01ZrcAlaiMGe89B]{Psionic Squire(Chosen Skill)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.UrYsCqEBY4mVMqqI]{Psionic Knight(Chosen Skill)} and Psionics (Chosen Skill) 12 rank

Benefits

When using psionic powers in the chosen skill, the PP cost is 5 less.

Special

This feat stacks with any other psionic power cost reduction feats. This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, it applies to a different psionic skill.
system.summary: -5 PP cost for chosen psi power
